objects.description: Password stealer and NTLM stealer modules in [CozyCar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0046) harvest stored credentials from the victim, including credentials used as part of Windows NTLM user authentication. [CozyCar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0046) has also executed [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002) for further victim penetration.

external_references.description: F-Secure Labs. (2015, April 22). CozyDuke: Malware Analysis. Retrieved December 10, 2015.
